channel.title: Max level 135? Exp rate higher? Phonescape!
channel.description:
hey guys, I need a detailed tutorial, on what to change to make max level 135 in phonescape, ive had some people complain 99 isn't that good. Which I agree.
Also, range and smithing is a killer to get 99, is there a way i can change xp rate for these?

item.title: Max level 135? Exp rate higher? Phonescape!
item.dc:creator: @andrew1234321 andrew1234321
item.description:
@andrew1234321 wrote:

aight sweet thx!!! Now if you knew how to switch skills to 135…Id like love you…in the non-unstraight way :p[br][size=1]Posted on: April 13, 2007, 11:38:42 AM[/size][hr]it shouldn’t be that hard? any1?

Read full topic

item.title: Max level 135? Exp rate higher? Phonescape!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

See it ,it says "addSkillXP((7* "chanche the 7 to whatever xp you want then save, compile, run

item.source: Max level 135? Exp rate higher? Phonescape!

item.title: Max level 135? Exp rate higher? Phonescape!
item.dc:creator: @andrew1234321 andrew1234321
item.description:
@andrew1234321 wrote:

I found

case 2514: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You shoot at the target."); actionName = "range1"; actionTimer = 30; setAnimation(426); addSkillXP((7*playerLevel[4]), 4); addSkillXP((5*playerLevel[18]), 18); addItem(3272, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

I don’t see what number i change

Read full topic
item.source: Max level 135? Exp rate higher? Phonescape!

item.title: Max level 135? Exp rate higher? Phonescape!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

yes, seach for the target to train range in client java. search for" case object#here" and then under that youll see “give player xp*600” or something, just change it.

Read full topic
